sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.568, 'Quartetto VI' (for title, see No. 183)
ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.569 and M.570. Two copies made in Berlin for Frederick William II
Modena, Bibl. Estense, Mus. F. 91 (for title and comment, see No. 183)
sources.first_edition: (1776?), Paris, La Chevardière: Op. 26 no. 6 (for title, see No. 183)
later_editions: (c. 1800), Paris, Imbault: Op. 26 no. 6 (for title and comment, see No. 183)
sources.modern_edition: The last movement—non troppo presto—has been published as an additional last movement to the quartet Op. 24 no. 4 (No. 192) by E. Polo (Milan, Ricordi, 1953; pocket score)
